Cell Declustering

Source: R/cell_declustering.R
declstr_weighted.Rd

Function returns list of points with their weights and lengths from grid cell in spatial object

declstr_weighted(spatial_object, cellsize)

Arguments

spatial_object

Object of class sfc or sf
cellsize

Target cellsize in map units

Value

Object of class sf

Examples

points4 = sf::st_read(system.file("points/punkty4.shp", package = "declusteringr"))
#> Reading layer `punkty4' from data source `C:\Users\Lenovo\AppData\Local\Temp\RtmpWEiNIQ\temp_libpath197c46c47f42\declusteringr\points\punkty4.shp' using driver `ESRI Shapefile'
#> Simple feature collection with 200 features and 1 field
#> geometry type:  POINT
#> dimension:      XY
#> bbox:           xmin: -1775590 ymin: -5316527 xmax: -1642585 ymax: -5237789
#> epsg (SRID):    NA
#> proj4string:    +proj=tmerc +lat_0=0 +lon_0=19 +k=0.9993 +x_0=500000 +y_0=-5300000 +ellps=GRS80 +units=m +no_defs
x = declstr_weighted(spatial_object = points4, cellsize = 10000)
x
